postActions.script:
cd placepress-blocks 
npm run build
echo "Copying to SVN trunk..."
rsync -a ../../placepress/ ~/Documents/SVN/placepress/trunk/ --exclude node_modules
echo "Copying to SVN next tag..."
rsync -a ../../placepress/ ~/Documents/SVN/placepress/tags/next --exclude node_modules --exclude '.*'
echo "Opening SVN directory..."
open ~/Documents/SVN/placepress

build.script:
#!/bin/sh
cd placepress-blocks
echo "Building project..."
npm run build
echo "Copying to SVN trunk..."
rsync -a ../../placepress/ ~/Documents/SVN/placepress/trunk/ --exclude node_modules
echo "Copying to SVN \"next\" tag..."
rsync -a ../../placepress/ ~/Documents/SVN/placepress/tags/next --exclude node_modules --exclude '.*'
echo "Opening SVN directory..."
open ~/Documents/SVN/placepress
